means: 塞住( stuff的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Mother stuffs the turkey before roasting it.
sentence.Network_cn: 妈妈把作料填在火鸡肚子里,然后去烤.

sentence.Network_en: This forum is basically for discussing [ Nokia ] related technical stuffs.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这个论坛里面,基本讨论对象都是和 [ [诺基亚 ] ]有关的技术话题.

sentence.Network_en: I searched online and got some stuffs and here are my summaries.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在网上搜到了一些资料,简单归纳一下.

PerfectNetExp.abs: This is a dream in which stuffs are which le loose or we oppress ., 在梦中 , 一切事都散漫着 , 都压着我 , 但这不过是一个梦呀 . 但我醒来时.
It is almost a certainly that certain stuffs and basic supplies will sell out ., 几乎可以肯定 , 某些食物原料和基本供给将售罄.
when you get old , few stuffs go wrong .当你老了，有三件事会出错。
handing out leaflets and stuffs in winter is the pit .在冬天分发传单等物品非常辛苦。

entry.def: You can use stuff to refer to things such as a substance, a collection of things, events, or ideas, or the contents of something in a general way without mentioning the thing itself by name.

example.ex: I'd like some coffee, and I don't object to the powdered stuff if it's all you've got...
example.tran: 我想来点咖啡，如果你只有速溶的那种也可以。

example.ex: I don't know anything about this antique stuff...
example.tran: 我对于这种古玩物件一无所知。

entry.def: If you stuff something somewhere, you push it there quickly and roughly.

example.ex: I stuffed my hands in my pockets...
He stuffed the newspapers into a litter bin and headed down the street...
example.tran: 他把报纸塞进了垃圾箱，然后沿街往前走了。

entry.def: If you stuff a container or space with something, you fill it with something or with a quantity of things until it is full.

example.ex: He grabbed my purse, opened it and stuffed it full, then gave it back to me...
example.tran: 他抢过我的钱包，打开并塞满钱，然后还给了我。

example.ex: He still stood behind his cash register stuffing his mouth with popcorn.
example.tran: 他仍站在收银机后，嘴里塞满了爆米花。

entry.def: If you stuff yourself, you eat a lot of food.

example.ex: I could stuff myself with ten chocolate bars and half an hour later eat a big meal.
example.tran: 我可以一口气吃10块巧克力，半小时后再吃一顿大餐。

entry.tran: 给…装馅儿;给(鸡、辣椒等食物里)加填料
entry.def: If you stuff a bird such as a chicken or a vegetable such as a pepper, you put a mixture of food inside it before cooking it.

example.ex: Will you stuff the turkey and shove it in the oven for me?
example.tran: 你能帮我给火鸡填上料然后放进烤箱里吗？

entry.def: If a dead animal is stuffed, it is filled with a substance so that it can be preserved and displayed.

example.ex: A pike weighing 29 lb 8 oz taken in 1878 was stuffed and is on display at the estate office...
example.tran: 一条 1878 年捕获的重 29 磅 8 盎司的梭子鱼被制成标本陈列在庄园管理处。

example.ex: He didn't much care for the stuffed animal heads that hung on the walls.
example.tran: 他不是很喜欢墙上挂的那些动物头颅标本。

entry.tran: 基本特征;特质;根本;基础
entry.def: If you say that one thing is the stuff of another, you mean that the first thing is a very important feature or characteristic of the second thing, or that the second thing can be based or built on the first thing.

example.ex: The idea that we can be whatever we want has become the stuff of television commercials.
example.tran: 每个人皆无所不能，这一理念已经成为电视广告的精髓。

entry.def: If you are angry with someone for something that they have said or done, you might say 'Get stuffed!' to them.

entry.tran: (用在名词前表示强调)不稀罕，不在乎
entry.def: Stuff is used in front of nouns to emphasize that you do not care about something, or do not want it.

example.ex: Ultimately my attitude was: stuff them...
example.tran: 我最终的态度是：去他们的。

example.ex: Stuff your money. We don't want a handout.
example.tran: 收起你的钱，我们不需要施舍。

entry.tran: 露一手;施展自己的本事
entry.def: If you do your stuff, you perform an activity in the way that people expect.

example.ex: Once I get on the pitch I know I can do my stuff...
example.tran: 我一上场就知道是我大显身手的时候了。

example.ex: All that was left was to plant the roses and wait for nature to do her stuff.
example.tran: 剩下的就只是栽上玫瑰，然后等大自然施展她的神奇魔力。

entry.def: If you say that someone knows their stuff, you mean that they are good at doing something because they know a lot about it.

example.ex: These chaps know their stuff after seven years of war.
example.tran: 7年的战争过后，这些家伙都成了作战行家。

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Isolate all food stuffs including pet food and particularly bird seed.

auth_sentence.res_content: They are telling me stuffs like today we won money, we are now rich!!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are telling me stuffs like  today we won money, we are now rich!!
